1. Chancellor Rachel Reeves to say growth is 'national mission'  BBC.com
  2. Rachel Reeves pledges to ‘fix foundations’ of UK economy with growth plan  The Guardian
  3. Investors Wait For Reeves Speech for Clues on Labor's Economic Vision  Bloomberg
  4. Labour Chancellor Rachel Reeves to bring back house-building targets  The Telegraph
  5. Reeves warns of ‘difficult decisions’ as she outlines plan to reverse £140bn Tory black hole  The Independent
